rules.text: Don't post anything which would violate the law in either your home jurisdiction, under US law, or Washington State law
Don't be a jerk.  Hate speech, discrimination, and harassment of any kind are not tolerated here.
If you post adult content, please mark it as sensitive so that your followers can choose when to see it.
No spam.  This includes using completely unrelated hashtags in your posts.
This instance is intended only for anyone who was ever employed at twitter, and select friends.
Please do not use trademarked usernames.
